headline: Rapist found guilty of infecting 2 women with AIDS
description: A Tel Aviv court has convicted a 31-year old man for raping 4 women and deliberately infecting 2 of them with the AIDS virus.    Chris Sargo, a Ghanese citizen, had claimed that he was framed by police, a claim dismissed by judges. (Vered Lovitz)
articleBody: A Tel Aviv court has convicted a 31-year old man for raping 4 women and deliberately infecting 2 of them with the AIDS virus.    Chris Sargo, a Ghanese citizen, had claimed that he was framed by police, a claim dismissed by judges. (Vered Lovitz)
title: שיעור בעיצוב דירה קטנה: 25 מ''ר עם כיוון אוויר אחד בלבד, ולא חסר בה דבר
